EmailTemplate.name: Data Steward Approval Email for Term

EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Term__c.OwnerFullName},
The request for approval of Term '{!Term__c.Name}' have been approved by Data Stewards. Please click here : {!Term__c.Link} to visit the Term.
Thank you, Salesforce
